name: Lizard Media
description:
About Lizard Media
UX & Software House from Poland. Comprehensive solutions and technology outsourcing: eCommerce with Magento2, PrestaShop, PIM and custom webapps driven by own User Experience and Design.
Since 2009 as Lizard Media we successfully design and implement effective eCommerce and Web solution to generate return on investment. Our team includes designers, developers and testers - including certified Magento2, Presta and Laravel developers.
 
We delivered solutions to various business sectors – retail, finance, banking, medical and industry.
